name: Horde Mode -Trial of the Dark Lord
summary: Experience the most challenging and engaging combat in DOOM Eternal, new mechanics, enemy variants, meathook platforming, AI Invasions, and much more in Horde Mode: Trial of The Dark Lord, a fan-made prequel expansion to DOOM Eternal - The Ancient Gods Part Two.
